summary: This document is an email correspondence dated August 12, 2019, regarding a psychological observation report for an inmate (I/M) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from July 24-30, 2019. The subject indicates the observation involved the utilization of an inmate companion.

events.title: Start of Psychological Observation Period
events.description: Beginning of a psychological observation period for an inmate at MCC New York, utilizing an inmate companion.

events.title: End of Psychological Observation Period
events.description: End of the psychological observation period for an inmate at MCC New York.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Observation
events.description: Email sent regarding the psychological observation report for an inmate from July 24-30, 2019.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.context: Federal detention facility where the psychological observation of an inmate took place.

keyFacts: A psychological observation was conducted on an inmate at MCC New York from July 24 to July 30, 2019.
The observation involved the utilization of an 'I/M companion' (inmate companion), suggesting special monitoring protocols.
The document is an email correspondence dated August 12, 2019, transmitting the observation report.
The location is the Metropolitan Correctional Center at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
